meanings.definition: Acting together with a carcinogen to cause cancer.
meanings.sent1: The cocarcinogenic increased the risk of cancer when combined with other harmful substances.
meanings.sent2: Researchers studied the effects of the cocarcinogenic on cancer development.
meanings.sent3: The cocarcinogenic and the carcinogen walked into a cell... and caused trouble!
meanings.sent4: Their partnership was like a dangerous dance, the cocarcinogenic leading the way to cancer.
meanings.sent5: The cocarcinogenic was like a silent partner in the cancer-causing process.
